channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description:
Okay so i have Apache Ant 1.7.1 Right. I have set all the paths and everything correctly with help from a good coder friend. The java paths and Apache path is all correct. I have a picture to privide you with to aswell. If you could help me and tell me what the problem is I would Appreciate it like soooooooOOoo Much! :)
[IMG]http://i97.photobucket.com/albums/l227/james_nye/untitled.jpg[/img]
Also
Compile [code]@echo off set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06 ant -buildfile .\build.xml cls ant pause[/code] and
Run [code]@echo off set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06 ant demonikp2p pause[/code]

item.title: Need Help!

item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

becuase the directory. In the folder u have to click twice to get into the main folder. It goes into another folder

item.title: Need Help!

item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

Okay so i have Apache Ant 1.7.1 Right. I have set all the paths and everything correctly with help from a good coder friend. The java paths and Apache path is all correct. I have a picture to privide you with to aswell. If you could help me and tell me what the problem is I would Appreciate it like soooooooOOoo Much!

Compile

and

Run
